t: Hallelujah!*pn Praise*ln the Lord*s from the heavens; praise*ln him in the heights.
Praise*ln him, all his angels; praise*ln him, all his heavenly armies.
Praise*ln him, sun and moon; praise*ln him, all you shining stars.
Praise*ln him, highest heavens, and*ln you waters above the heavens.
Let*ln them praise the name of the Lord,*s for*ln he commanded, and they were created.
He*ln set them in position forever and ever; he*ln gave an order that will never pass away.
Praise*pn the Lord*s from the earth, all*ln sea monsters and ocean depths,
lightning*ln and hail, snow and cloud, stormy*ln wind that executes his command,
mountains*ln and all hills, fruit*ln trees and all cedars,
wild*ln animals and all cattle, creatures*ln that crawl and flying birds,
kings*ln of the earth and all peoples, princes*ln and all judges of the earth,
young*ln men as well as young women, old*ln and young together.
Let*ln them praise the name of the Lord,*s for*ln his name alone is exalted. His*ln majesty covers heaven and earth.
He*ln has raised up a horn for his people, resulting*ln in praise to all his faithful ones, to*ln the Israelites, the people close to him. Hallelujah!*ln
